table.title: Count of Installed Software on Computer where Less than 2 Instances Exist

search.query: index=sccm sourcetype="sccm-installedsoftware" | fillnull value="-" |dedup ComputerName ProductName00 |eventstats count(ProductName00) as Test values(ProductName00) as TestList values(Publisher00) as Publisher by ProductName00| eventstats count(Publisher00) as PublisherCount by Publisher00 | where Test <=2 | where PublisherCount <= 50 |stats sum(Test) list(TestList) list(Publisher) list(Test) list(PublisherCount) by ComputerName | sort -sum(Test)
